###**Sung-Soo Kim** _Senior Researcher_ Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI), South Korea _sungsoo@etri.re.kr_ _sungsookim@kaist.ac.kr_ http://sungsoo.github.io *** ### WORK EXPERIENCE ####Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI) _Senior Researcher_ Research on multiscreen services, photo-realistic rendering (global illumination), real-time rendering, geometry compression algorithms, spatio-temporal data modeling/indexing and route determination algorithms. ####Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) _Researcher_ Research on reuse based software engineering for large information systems. *** ###RESEARCH INTERESTS
  • **Computer Graphics and Human Computer Interaction** Photo-realistic rendering, mesh simplification, multiresolution modeling, terrain simplification and rendering, geometric compression, non-photorealistic rendering and HCI.
  • **Real-time Graphics Applications** 3D GIS, Video GIS, Geographic Hypermedia Scientific visualization (noise and vibration data), 3D graphics library and rendering engine for 3D GIS, spatio-temporal data modeling (spatial indexing) and Video GIS using 3D GIS.
  • **Algorithm Design and Analysis** Route determination algorithm for OpenLS specification and slot reuse algorithms for CRMA high speed network.
  • **Software Engineering Research** Object-oriented software design and implementation, component-based software development (COM, EJB), reuse-based software engineering and service-oriented architecture (XML Web service).
